a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif;font-weight:500

text.tspan: Literacy rates vs. average years of schooling, 2015
The vertical axis measures literacy rates for population aged 15 and older, combining data from a number of sources
(see sources tab for more details). The horizontal axis measures average number of years of total schooling across all
education levels, for the population aged 15-64.
Adult literacy rate, population 15+ years, both sexes (%)
Data source: Literacy rates (World Bank, CIA World Factbook, and other sources); Lee and Lee (2016)
